participant_1.name: Ethan
participant_1.personality: Curious and adventurous, Ethan is always eager to explore the world around him, despite the challenges he faces.
participant_1.background: since the surgery i've had strange powers. i can move objects with my mind. i had to have a transplant. i'm a boy. i was born with my heart outside my body.

participant_2.name: Linda
participant_2.personality: Caring and nurturing, Linda has a strong passion for helping others, which shines in her work as a nurse.
participant_2.background: i am a baby delivery nurse. i walk three miles every day. my favorite way to relax is to read a book. i love disneyland and mickey mouse. i love to spend time with my family.

content.text:
Hi i am a baby delivery nurse.
What about you?
